effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 910,135 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 472,724.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,229, further increased by 339 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 17,984 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 53,953 Nature Damage instead.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 207,766 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,400 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Spire of Withering Dreams

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
